Defibrilator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Lose !M! HP. NL Gain 6 Regen. NL Exhaust.

EyeForAnEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Every time you lose HP, deal 2 times as much damage to a random enemy.

TheLaw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Retain. NL Remove ALL  Strength, Vulnerable, Weak, Intangible and Slow NL from ALL creatures NL (Including you). NL Exhaust.
